direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying the state of the composite maps, with clear() removing all mappings and remove() removing a specific mapping.
Both methods modify the contents of the composite maps, with clear() removing all entries and put() adding or updating a specific entry.
Both methods involve modifying the composite maps, with clear() removing all mappings and putAll() adding multiple mappings.
Both methods modify the composite maps, with clear() removing all mappings and addComposited() adding a new map to the composite.
Both methods modify the composite maps, with clear() removing all mappings and removeComposited() removing a specific map from the composite.
